# King Street, Essex

|static_image=Tree-lined avenue, King Street, Essex - geograph.org.uk - 78251.jpg
|static_image_caption=Tree-lined avenue, King Street, Essex, looking east. King Street is both the name of the road and the small hamlet nearby.
}}
King Street is a hamlet in the High Ongar civil parish of the Epping Forest district of Essex, England. The hamlet, a linear development along King Street road, is  south of the A414 Harlow-Chelmsford road. King Street is  east of the parish village of High Ongar, and less than 1 mile north of the hamlet of Nine Ashes. The county town of Chelmsford is  to the east.
